name: agentic-finance-director-app
description: An autonomous AI-powered finance decision engine connecting FP&A, Treasury, and Accounting into one unified system.

scripts.portal:build: cd Portals/agentic-finance-director-app && npx ng build --configuration production
scripts.portal:build:dev: cd Portals/agentic-finance-director-app && npx ng build --configuration development
scripts.backend:scaffold:crud: bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/01_crud_api_foundation.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/02_command_center_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/03_fpa_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/04_treasury_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/05_accounting_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/06_risk_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/07_monitoring_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/08_admin_module.sh && bash Project_Setup/Scripts/Backend/Services/09_activate_all_routers.sh
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:crud-api" "npm run dev:agent-gateway" "npm run portal:start"
scripts.install:backend: npm run install:crud-api && npm run install:agent-gateway
scripts.install:all: npm run portal:install && npm run install:backend
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:seed
scripts.docs:crud-api: open http://localhost:8000/docs || xdg-open http://localhost:8000/docs 2>/dev/null || echo 'Open http://localhost:8000/docs'
scripts.docs:agent-gateway: open http://localhost:8001/docs || xdg-open http://localhost:8001/docs 2>/dev/null || echo 'Open http://localhost:8001/docs'
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:crud-api && npm run docs:agent-gateway
scripts.health:all: npm run health:crud-api && npm run health:agent-gateway
scripts.logs: docker logs -f afda-crud-api afda-agent-gw afda-n8n afda-postgres afda-mongodb afda-redis
scripts.clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:pyc
